title: Ep 15: Zen and Surfing with Graham Elwood
description: What is so damn spiritual about surfing? Graham Elwood and I discuss how a traumatic trip to Afghanistan changed his life. Also, would you get back in the water after a shark took your arm?
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
